title: 10 Perches Land Block for Sale, Matara (Walgama) facing Galle- Colombo Main Road
location: Matara Walgama (facing Galle- Colombo Main Road), Matara
details:
* A valuable 10 Perches Land Block for Sale, Matara (Walgama), facing Galle- Colombo Main
Road.

* Clear title, with “Bim Sawiya” deed assured and declared 100% ownership
with 1 st Class ownership.

* Suitable for House. Medical Center, Shops, Computer institute or any other
Commercials purpose.
There are plenty of established Businesses surrounding this land, and land where
anyone can easily initiate business.

* Near by : Arpico Super Center, Toyata Lanka Matara, Indra Traders, Wheels Lanka
(Pvt) Ltd., United Moters, Richcomes Service Center, Sujith Auto Electricals ,
Nosaka Motor Dealers, Nipun Motors, Tharindu Motors, Saheli international, Rajitha
Computers, Sarasi Group, Hemalie (Pvt) LTD,

* Very close proximity to Banks, Super Markets, Private & Government Institution,
Hospitals, and all Leading Government & International Schools etc.

* Easy access to Southern Highway Entrance.
